Notification: Essential Logistics Weekly Maintenance

______________________________________________________________________________

______________________________________________________________________________ 

Dear Colleagues,

 

To ensure business continuity, we have scheduled essential maintenance to enhance the underlying infrastructure of the database systems for WMS and AIA

Saturday, December 07, 2024, | 10:00 PM â€“ 11:59 PM GST

Please be aware that during this period, access to the Warehouse Application (WMS) and Oracle AIA will be temporarily unavailable. 

If you require assistance during this time, kindly raise a support ticket via the following  link: https://onereach.chalhoub.com <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonereach.chalhoub.com%2F&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cdaa2cec95a2b4de7868b08dd12a21059%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638687210277036711%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=8lLE%2FogL8rqdKwiU%2FqDx0MqY0h0oLj45JlMYQx0UI40%3D&reserved=0>
